2.sentence: The SEA ethnicities have a history of being scheming, lazy and dirty. None of this makes them attractive to women. In movies you'll always see them as side kicks to Europeans. You might hear jokes about their penis sizes (something I can't confirm because I've never seen one lol). On the other hand, europeans are always portrayed rightfully as the good guys or genius evil super villains. Good looking white actors are always chosen... And I can't recall any negatives stereotypes of them while I growing up.
